notes.text: We now ensure that the Share: Microsoft Teams functionality works correctly in our building blocks
Columns with a specific scale for a given unit of measure are now correctly exported
We've resolved an issue where fields were not shown if a maximum annotation or a minimum annotation was used but no date annotation was used in validation
We now ensure that the bindingInfo path of the chart is correct on the object page
We now ensure that list report tables work correctly even after a new filter is added using the Adapt Filters dialog
Selection mode now works correctly in a list report with multi-entity sets
We now support displaying a hierarchy within a value help
We now ensure that the conditions can be selected correctly in the value help.
We now show an illustrated message if there is no data in a chart
You can now change the illustrated messages of tables
We now reset table personalization when the app is relaunched after refreshing
We now ensure that the grouping header for Boolean properties is correctly formatted
Tables in the analytical list page now provide a Show Details link for subtotals with various units
We now prevent multiple clicks on an action button for an intent-based navigation
You can now move nodes up and down using the context menu in tree tables
We now show an illustrated message if there is no data in a table
We’ve resolved an issue where design-time changes caused errors on overview pages
We now properly send `null` when clearing a nullable field
The MessageButton now only displays validation errors for controls outside of a table that have validation errors and back-end errors
We now ensure that extended semantic date operators work correctly after the app is reloaded
We’ve now enabled the date picker with a minimum allowed date and a maximum allowed date
We now ensure that screen readers correctly read out the information of micro charts
We now ensure that screen readers correctly read out the information of popup dialogs
We’ve now increased the loading threshold to 100 when scrolling in a non-responsive table
We now exclude columns that use 1:n navigation from table exports
We now avoid duplicate GET requests when a user clicks the Go button in the filter bar of a value help dialog
We've resolved an issue where the custom text defined for the empty title of the object page wasn't appearing correctly
We now ensure that unselected quick filter counts are correctly updated when an object page is open in flexible column layout mode
We've resolved an issue with adding a filter field at runtime
We now merge the subsection title with the collection facet if the section title is empty
We now ensure that the application correctly loads the default variant with the custom operator
We now correctly show the column header of line items annotated as dataFieldForAnnotations
We now ensure that the dropdown list loads all values
We now ensure that the requestAtLeast properties are included in the table export
We now ensure that the field change event name remains consistent with the public API
We've resolved an issue with adding a filter to a filter bar variant.
We now ensure that the Table API works correctly with the UploadSetwithTable plugin
We've resolved an issue with the columns referencing navigation properties that don't have a property type
We've resolved an issue with value help columns referencing navigation properties with text annotations
FieldControl annotation in action parameter dialog now works as expected for edm.paths
The table export now works correctly after a create action
We now ensure that the custom operator in the FilterBar building block is loaded when the app starts
We've increased the data load threshold to 500 values for the value help dropdown list
We've now enabled the pagination feature again for all value help dropdowns
We've resolved an issue where the Chart building block didn't load in extension fragments
